data.comment: Akhmat Grozny kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to CSKA Moscow's area.
In the minute 2, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Andres Ponce hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Grozny for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 3, Zoran Nizic (Akhmat Grozny) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 6, Akhmat Grozny will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from CSKA Moscow.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 8, CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Sergei Ivanov signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
In the minute 10, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Konstantin Kuchaev.
That's a fine assist from Fedor Chalov.
In the minute 12, Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In Grozny CSKA Moscow attack through Ivan Oblyakov. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 13, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Vladimir Iljin of Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sergei Ivanov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Akhmat Grozny are pushing forward but Vladimir Iljin's finish is wide of the goal.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 20, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 23, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
At Akhmat-Arena, CSKA Moscow are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 27, Sergei Ivanov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
In the minute 30, Nayair Tiknizyan (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 32, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
CSKA Moscow push forward at Akhmat-Arena and Nikola Vlasic gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Akhmat Grozny defence.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Akhmat Grozny's half?
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
Evgeny Kharin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Akhmat Grozny's Zoran Nizic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 37, Akhmat Grozny's Evgeny Kharin looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 39, At Akhmat-Arena, Konstantin Maradishvili has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ismael Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 41, Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Ismael Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 44, Free kick for CSKA Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Grozny - CSKA Moscow with the kick-off.
CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Akhmat Grozny make their first substitution with Georgi Melkadze replacing Andres Ponce.
Odise Roshi is replacing Evgeny Kharin for the home team.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Nayair Tiknizyan with Baktiyor Zaynutdinov.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 48, Sergei Ivanov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Mario Fernandes (CSKA Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 49, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Akhmat Grozny's Odise Roshi misses with an attempt on goal.
Sergei Ivanov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Odise Roshi for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sergei Ivanov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Bernard Berisha fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 53, CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov has been booked in Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 56, The match at Akhmat-Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Igor Diveev, who is down injured.
Igor Diveev returns to the field for CSKA Moscow after picking up a slight injury.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 58, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Fedor Chalov for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Sergei Ivanov signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's third substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Oleg Ivanov replacing Artem Timofeev.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Andrey Semenov for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 64, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny drive forward through Bernard Berisha. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Viktor Goncharenko (CSKA Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Chidera Ejuke replacing Fedor Chalov.
In the minute 65, Kristijan Bistrovic is on a sub for Konstantin Maradishvili for CSKA Moscow.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 68, Akhmat Grozny's Ismael Silva gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 75, Igor Diveev (CSKA Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick in a good position for Akhmat Grozny!
The away team replace Ivan Oblyakov with Jaka Bijol.
Bruno Fuchs is replacing Konstantin Kuchaev for the away team.
Georgi Schennikov is booked for the away team.
In the minute 79, Bernard Berisha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
In Grozny, Akhmat Grozny push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Akhmat-Arena.
Attention is being given to Akhmat Grozny’s Ismael Silva and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 84, Ismael Silva has recovered and rejoins the match in Grozny.
Baktiyor Zaynutdinov (CSKA Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 85, CSKA Moscow's Chidera Ejuke gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Akhmat Grozny make their fourth substitution with Lechii Sadulaev replacing Bernard Berisha.
Arsen Adamov is on a sub for Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov for Akhmat Grozny.
Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 88, Goal! Kristijan Bistrovic extends CSKA Moscow's lead to 0-2.
Nikola Vlasic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 89, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow just outside Akhmat Grozny's area.
Zoran Nizic for Akhmat Grozny has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
At Akhmat-Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Georgi Melkadze for Akhmat Grozny is whistled offside.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Akhmat-Arena.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
Arsen Adamov (Akhmat Grozny) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Nikola Vlasic puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
